title: Gemini Nano
welcome_unavailable:
Unfortunately either your device doesn't support Gemini Nano or the Google AICore is unavailable to the app. For more information, trouleshooting steps and to report issues, please visit the GitHub repository.

For more information about Gemini Nano availability, please visit the MLKit GenAI documentation.
welcome_available: Currently, Gemini Nano is offered in alpha version and there is a limit of tokens per minute. It may break or produce unexpected results. Please report any issues you encounter on the GitHub repository and remember that AI may make mistakes. Content AI generates does not reflect opinion of the app developer or Google.
ai_may_not_differ_prompt_and_instruction: Gemini may not differentiate between prompt and instructions.
prompt_hint: E.g., 'Write a poem about AI in the style of Shakespeare.'
no_context_yet: There is no context (YET!), each response is standalone
